title: Kayn's base form sucks and needs a buff
body:
He is so weak early that if you do farm well and stay even with laners in level that if you gank someone and they are only 30-40% health you are probably going to die even if you hit everything.

This makes transforming a real challenge and thats IF you get the form you want. Sometimes I need to go the other form and the extra 3 minute wait has me transforming at the 18 minute mark... feels terrible.

I'm playing him a lot right now but I'm staring to catch on that he kinda sucks in the current meta. It's the same weak early game as yi but with less reliable hyperscaling.
